name: Spaghetti Bolognese
preparation: Heat a pan and cook the beef until browned. Add the onion and garlic, then stir in tomatoes and wine. Simmer for 20 minutes.

name: Chicken Curry
preparation: Cook the chicken in a pan until golden. Add onion, garlic, and curry powder. Stir in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
preparation: Heat oil in a pan, add vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Pour in soy sauce and cook for another minute.

name: Beef Stroganoff
preparation: Heat oil in a pan and cook beef until brown. Add onion and mushrooms, then stir in sour cream. Simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Pancakes
preparation: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until smooth. Pour batter into a hot pan and cook until bubbles form, then flip.

name: Margherita Pizza
preparation: Spread tomato sauce on the base, add mozzarella, and bake at 200°C for 10-15 minutes. Garnish with basil and drizzle with olive oil.

name: Greek Salad
preparation: Mix cucumber, tomato, feta, and olives in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

name: Omelette
preparation: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Pour into a pan with melted butter, add cheese, and fold when cooked.

name: Lemon Chicken
preparation: Marinate chicken in lemon and garlic. Cook in a pan with olive oil until golden and cooked through.

name: Mushroom Risotto
preparation: Cook onion and mushrooms in butter, add rice, and gradually stir in stock until absorbed.

name: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
preparation: Cook pasta as directed. In a pan, cook shrimp with garlic in olive oil, then combine with pasta.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
preparation: Stuff bell peppers with a mix of beef, onion, and rice. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Tuna Salad
preparation: Mix tuna, cucumber, and tomato in a bowl. Stir in mayonnaise and season with salt and pepper.

name: Apple Pie
preparation: Arrange apples on the crust, sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon, dot with butter, and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
preparation: Mix ingredients, form cookies, and bake at 180°C for 10 minutes.

name: Quinoa Salad with Vegetables
preparation: Cook the quinoa, chop the vegetables, and mix all ingredients.

name: Pumpkin Soup
preparation: Sauté vegetables, add broth and coconut milk, simmer and blend.

name: Avocado and Egg Sandwich
preparation: Boil the egg, slice avocado, and assemble with bread and spinach.

name: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
preparation: Cook spaghetti, prepare sauce with tomatoes and garlic, mix with pasta.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry with Vegetables
preparation: Stir-fry chicken and vegetables, add soy sauce and ginger, cook until tender.

name: Oatmeal with Fruit
preparation: Cook oatmeal in milk, add chopped fruit, honey, and cinnamon.

name: Chili Con Carne
preparation: Sauté beef with onion and garlic, add beans and tomatoes, simmer on low heat.

name: Berry Smoothie
preparation: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

name: Pasta Carbonara
preparation: Cook pasta, mix with bacon, eggs, and parmesan for the sauce.

name: Guacamole
preparation: Mash avocado, add chopped vegetables and lime juice, season with salt.
